content: उक्त {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Said, spoken. {@--2@} Uttered, spoken (<ab>opp.</ab> to अनुमित or संभावित). {@--3@} Told, addressed; असावनुक्तोऽपि सहाय एव <ls>Ku. 3. 21.</ls> --क्तं A speech, words collectively; a sentence. --क्तं --क्ता A stanza of four lines with one syllabic instant, (there being one long or two short syllables in each).
